description: Equip: Earth Shield healing is increased by 150% if your Earth Shield target is below 75% health, and Healing Wave adds a stack of Earth Shield to your target, up to 9 maximum stacks.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Splintered Elements:

Each additional Healing Wave generated by Primordial Wave increases your Haste by 10% for 12 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Shadow Word: Manipulation:

Mindgames lasts an additional 3 sec and reverses an additional 10% damage or healing. When Mindgames can no longer reverse healing or damage, gain 5% Critical Strike for each second remaining for 10 sec.

Equip: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.
Equip: Earth Elemental has a permanent Earthquake attached to it.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Splintered Elements:

Each additional Healing Wave generated by Primordial Wave increases your Haste by 10% for 12 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Deathspike:

Serrated Bone Spike has 2 additional charges and launches 1 additional bone spike at nearby enemies.
Equip: Vanish grants 5 combo points and increases all damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.
Equip: Corruption damage is increased by 25%, and each time it deals damage any of your Curses active on the target are extended by 1.5 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Decaying Soul Satchel:

Each target affected by Soul Rot increases your haste and critical strike chance by 5% for 8 sec.

Equip: Light of Dawn's range is increased to 40 yards. All allies within your Light of Dawn benefit from Mastery: Lightbringer as though they were within 10 yards for 8 sec.

Word of Glory receives 50% increased benefit from your Mastery.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Duty-Bound Gavel:

Vanquisher's Hammer gains 1 additional charge. An additional cast of Word of Glory will automatically trigger Light of Dawn.

Equip: Reduce the effectiveness of crowd controlling effects by 10%. Successfully applying a loss of control effect to an enemy, interrupting an enemy, or dispelling any target will increase all your secondary stats by 80 for 15 sec. This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Pallid Command:

Casting Unholy Nova summons a Rattling Mage that gains 2% additional damage and healing each time an enemy affected by Unholy Transfusion is damaged by an ally, up to 100%.

The Rattling Mage serves you for 20 sec, blasting your target for 778 Shadow damage.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Decaying Soul Satchel:

Each target affected by Soul Rot increases your haste and critical strike chance by 5% for 8 sec.
Equip: Drain Life now channels 100% faster and restores health 100% faster.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Seeds of Rampant Growth:

Each pulse of Fae Transfusion's damage effect reduces the cooldown of Feral Spirit by 9.0 sec and increases your critical strike chance by 4% for 15 sec.
Equip: Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 3%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 2.0 sec.

Equip: Tiger Palm now has a 10 yard range and dashes you to the target when used.

Tiger Palm also applies an effect which increases your critical strike chance by 50% for 6 sec on the target. This effect cannot be applied more than once every 1 min per target.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Bountiful Brew:

Your abilities have a low chance to cast Bonedust Brew at your target's location.
Equip: Eviscerate, Rupture, and Black Powder increase the damage of your next use of the finishing move by 25%.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Resounding Clarity:

Echoing Reprimand now animacharges 4 combo points.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Heart of the Fae:

Shifting Power can be channeled while moving. Each enemy hit by Shifting Power grants you 1% Critical Strike and Haste, up to 10% for 15 sec.
Equip: Casting a Frost, Fire and Arcane spell within 10 sec of each other increases your Critical Strike damage of all your spells by 20%. This effect can only occur once every 30 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Shadow Word: Manipulation:

Mindgames lasts an additional 3 sec and reverses an additional 10% damage or healing. When Mindgames can no longer reverse healing or damage, gain 5% Critical Strike for each second remaining for 10 sec.
Equip: Power Word: Radiance has a 60% chance to cause your next Penance to be free and fire 3 extra bolts.
Equip: Rapid Fire deals 35% additional damage, and Aimed Shot has a 15% chance to reset the cooldown of Rapid Fire.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Pact of the Soulstalkers:

When your Resonating Arrow deals damage to a target, your party gains 10% increased critical strike chance for 10 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Abomination's Frenzy:

Abomination Limb's duration is increased by 4 sec and the frequency it grants Rime is increased by 2 sec. The first time an enemy is damaged by Abomination Limb they take 20% increased damage from you for 12 sec.
Equip: Frostwyrm's Fury has 50% reduced cooldown and Freezes all enemies hit for 3 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Sinful Delight:

Consuming Clearcast reduces Mirrors of Torment's cooldown by 4 sec. If Mirrors of Torment is dispelled the cooldown is reduced by 45 sec.
Equip: Arcane Barrage deals an additional 130% damage against targets below 35% health.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Kindred Affinity:

You and your Kindred Spirit each gain a bonus secondary stat based on their Covenant. This bonus is halved for your Kindred Spirit, however both bonuses are doubled while the bond is Empowered.

Kyrian: Mastery increased by 210.
Night Fae: Haste increased by 6%.
Venthyr: Critical Strike chance increased by 6%.
Necrolord: Versatility increased by 6%.
Equip: Starsurge and Starfall reduce the cost of Starsurge and Starfall by 10% and increase their damage by 10% for 5 sec, stacking up to 2 times.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Elemental Conduit:

Up to 5 friendly targets healed by Chain Harvest will have Riptide cast on them. Up to 5 enemy targets damaged by Chain Harvest will have Flame Shock cast on them. Flame Shock critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Chain Harvest by 1.0 sec.
Equip: Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 3%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 2.0 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Bwonsamdi's Pact:

Enter a pact with the Death Loa, calling forth a haunted mask that lingers on a target until Fae Guardians ends.

Haunted Mask: Copies the benefit of the current faerie on its target. Follows your Direct Mask.

Equip: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Glory:

Conqueror's Banner affects 1 additional ally and every 25 Rage you spend while it is active increases the duration of your banner by 0.5 sec.
Equip: Rampage has a 30% chance to apply the Siegebreaker effect to your target for 6 sec.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Deathspike:

Serrated Bone Spike has 2 additional charges and launches 1 additional bone spike at nearby enemies.
Equip: The remaining cooldown on Vendetta is reduced by 1 sec for every 30 Energy you expend.
Equip: Between the Eyes has a 20% chance per Combo Point to increase the damage of your next Pistol Shot by 300%.

Equip: Gain the legendary effect of Resounding Clarity:

Echoing Reprimand now animacharges 4 combo points.

Equip: Healing with Enveloping Mists or Vivify while channeling Soothing Mists increases their healing done by 20% and reduces their mana cost by 20%. Stacks up to 3 times.

When your Soothing Mists channel ends, this effect is cancelled.
